attributes.action: Test anyone showing Covid19 symptoms including mild & increase contact tracing
attributes.additional_details: It has been shown in Korea and the other previously affected countries that increased testing, screening and contact tracing greatly reduces the spread of the virus.
attributes.background: Increase covid19 testing: All patients showing showing covid19 symptoms, no matter how mild should be able to be tested, even if that means them having to pay towards private testing. Contact tracing should be increased to isolate possible new cases.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling for the Governemnt to provide publicly accessible testing for coronavirus around the UK, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
